properties.areaDesc: Wabash, IL; White, IL; Posey, IN; Gallatin, IL; Gibson, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 8:39AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Illinois...Indiana...

Wabash River at New Harmony

.Runoff from recent heavy rain...along with additional forecast
rainfall will cause minor flooding to develop on the Wabash River at
New Harmony Indiana. The river will reach flood stage Thursday morning.
It will crest at 16.9 feet on Wednesday, February 19.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Wabash River at New Harmony.
* from Thursday morning until further notice.
* At  7:30 AM Wednesday the stage was 13.6 feet.
* Flood Stage is 15.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by late Thursday morning and
continue to rise to near 16.9 feet by Wednesday...February 19th.
* Impact...At 19.0 Feet...Harmonie State Park is closed. Surrounding
bottomland is flooded.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
